directions: Pour water into a saucepan, and add the lemon zest strips.  Bring to a boil over high heat.  Once the water begins to boil, remove from the heat and stir in the honey, cinnamon, and lemon grass.  Allow to steep for 2 minutes, then stir in lemon juice.  Strain; serve hot or cold.
ingredients: 4 lemons, zest peeled off in strips and juiced
title: Lemon Grass Lemonade
